page.title: 13BMX CYCLING
page.content: BMX is a craze of the eighties it takes 2 forms;dirt track racing with jumps,ramps etc.,and freestyle which involves tricks on specially adapted cycles.Falls are common,so special protective clothing is needed.Many professional riders earn thousands of dollars.The cycles have light,strong frames with twenty inch wheels.Parts can be removed or added so that customised bikes can be achieved.BMX is very popular in Swansea and there are a number of tracks.Our local track is at Birchgrove.There are race meets every fortnight.The track was built as the result of a petition from local riders.It was designed by ourselves and it took 2 months to complete.Many of the races are sponsored by local BMX shops and the sport is really well established. {Kevin Goodbourn}
